column2:
[Root.GetBestName],
I welcome you into the ranks of the Warriors of the Rising Sun and hope that you will prove your honor, your bravery, and your martial prowess. Keep your sword at your side at all times, respect and honor your superiors, and hone your skills, and you may go far.

By my hand and seal,
[wotrs_leader.GetSocietyRank] [wotrs_leader.GetFirstName]
